ygData.subject: You .have a Virus!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: What you have is the Mellisa Word virus. Goto this web site and read up on it. I will tell you have to get rid of it.
ygData.messageBody:
What you have is the Mellisa Word virus. Goto this web site and read up on
it. I will tell you have to get rid of it.
http://www.mcafee.com/viruses/melissa/what_melissa_does.asp
I hope everything goes well for you.
Taerian Valmont of Povar
----- Original Message -----
From: Junka <junka@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, November 24, 1999 5:42 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Help plz.


> From: Junka <junka@...>
>
>
> This e-mail isn't about EQ, its about a v´┐¢rus that infected a computer at
> my work. It only appears when Microsoft Word is running, it says:
>
> "Twenty-two points, plus triple-word-score, plus fifty points for using
all
> my letters. Game's over. I'm outta here."
>
> If any of you know anything about this virus, plz let me know.
>
> Thank you
>
> Junka. Bard of the 8th circle.
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
